Black castle on his strong side.

Black has now, as this is the case in this kind of openning (hypermodern chess, if I'm correct), a far better control on the center and white an advance on one side. but this is a blunder which will cost white's 1 pawn and this advance.
Mistake, white should have taken the pawn. Now black will have it for free.
Mistake, white should have taken the pawn. Now black will have it for free.
Now, white's advance on the kingside is broken. The no mans land between the 2 armies is on white side of the board : black controls more space. The next assault is about to begin.

White carrieson attacking, not such a bad idea because he doesn 't have to let the initiative to black who has material advantage and several attacking options with the centralised bishops and knights (right or left side and center)

weak moves. It enables the DSB to protect d4 which is exposed but which black can harly attack... but it doesn't prevent black's plan. Nd3 would have been better to menace the dangerous black DSB.

black controls or contests 45 squares against 30 for white.
kings are safe, black is in advance in material, black is far better on the center and controls the open file. His pieces poorly protect each other but the 2 bishops directed on the king are very dangerous.

mistake : white should group his pieces before attacking again. In the following trades, black wins another pawn.

The position is annoying for black : the pieces are not well placed. Black has to reorganise his game.
But the material advance and center control widely compensate.
